item.title:
The longest prehistoric human trail ever discovered is 1.5 km long, located in New Mexico, made during the ice age. The footprints belong to a young adult and a toddler. She was in a hurry and some times carried the child on her back
[read more: https://t.co/nCejzIHLgl] https://t.co/VOjg7lcU6g
